title: Do you speak English?
errmessage: We are sorry, but we are only enrolling surfers who speak English.

title: Are you 18 years or older?
errmessage: We are sorry, but we are only enrolling surfers are 18 years or older.

title: Do you plan to surf in California in the next 3 months?
errmessage: We are sorry, but we are only enrolling surfers who plan to surf in California in the next 3 months.

title: Do you have internet access with a computer or a smartphone?
errmessage: We are sorry, but we are only enrolling surfers who have internet access, because the study will rely on reporting through the web.
